content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

DROP Table [wwi].[FactPurchase]

CREATE TABLE [wwi].[FactPurchase]
( 
	[PurchaseKey] [bigint]  NOT NULL,
	[DateKey] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[SupplierKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[StockItemKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[WWIPurchaseOrderID] [int]  NULL,
	[OrderedOuters] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[OrderedQuantity] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[ReceivedOuters] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[Package] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[IsOrderFinalized] [nvarchar](5)  NOT NULL,
	[LineageKey] [int]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [SupplierKey] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO


COPY INTO wwi.FactPurchase
(PurchaseKey 1, DateKey 2, SupplierKey 3, StockItemKey 4, WWIPurchaseOrderID 5, OrderedOuters 6, OrderedQuantity 7, ReceivedOuters 8, Package 9, IsOrderFinalized 10, LineageKey 11)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-factpurchase.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.FactPurchase
GO
